EmailTemplate.name: Esso ENG Fleet Data App Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Esso Application Is Being Processed | Action Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
I received your completed application. Thank you for getting it over to me. Credit will have up to five business days to make final decision on your account.
Meanwhile, I am attaching a general form that indicates the information we will need to set up your account:
Driver Information:
· Please provide a list of your driver names with four or six-digit driver ID numbers. If you prefer us to assign the driver ID numbers, simply leave that field blank. You driver will be required to enter this number at the point of sale. It allows them access to all cards and will trace their name along with any transaction they make.
Vehicle Information:
· Only one column of information is mandatory, the rest (such as license plate number of VIN number) are optional.
· Please select one field that you would like to see appear on the second line of your card, beneath your Company name. This information will also appear on your reports.
o This field of information is meant to be a means of identification for you so you will know which vehicle is being fueled.
Please email or fax this form back to me at {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Owner_Fax__c} at your earliest convenience.
Need help filling out the form? Watch our 5 minute informational video!
http://www.wexcard.com/wexfleettutorial
As soon as your account is approved, an Account Setup Specialist will call you to cover all set-up details with you before ordering your cards.
Thank you and please call me if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName} {!Opportunity.OwnerLastName} {!Opportunity.OwnerTitle} Phone - {!Opportunity.OwnerPhone} Fax - {!Opportunity.Opportunity_Owner_Fax__c} {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of WEX Inc. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
WEX Inc., 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
This is an advertisement from WEX Inc. If you no longer wish to receive future email advertisements from {!User.Email}, email us to unsubscribe. Please be sure to include your name, company name and email address in the email.
